name: Holy shit! A spider!!!
description:
The bigger you are, the bigger you multiplier is, but also the easier you can get killed! Try to save your spider at the last moment to keep your score.(Even so your multiplier is reseted)

The difficulty of the game increase with time. Can you beat my hi-score of 2000 points ? :p

Check out the ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/holy-shit-a...

You can also check my new game made for a 1 dollar challenge: https://satalien.itch.io/cuteness-overload
